bibl.title: The Oxford Handbook of Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: 44 contributions. - Pp. 1-8: Chr.R.: Introduction. - Part I: Land and state. - Part. II: City, town and chora. - Part III: People. - Part IV: Religion. - Part V: Texts and language. - Part VI: Images and objects. - Part VII: Borders, trade, and tourism. - Pp. 763-791: Index.
bibl.seg: Riggs Christina (Ed.), The Oxford Handbook of Roman Egypt.
Oxford, Oxford University Press, 2012, 8°, xxii-791 pp., 1 carte, 10 tabl. et 146 figg. ISBN 978-0-19-957145-1. £95.

44 contributions. - Pp. 1-8: Chr.R.: Introduction. - Part I: Land and state. - Part. II: City, town and chora. - Part III: People. - Part IV: Religion. - Part V: Texts and language. - Part VI: Images and objects. - Part VII: Borders, trade, and tourism. - Pp. 763-791: Index.
